name: Breaking Cultic Psychological Manipulation
description: Techniques for identifying and countering the psychological tactics used by cults to control individuals and groups.

cards.title: Recognizing Psychological Control Mechanisms
cards.description: Analyzing the psychological tactics cults use to break down resistance and enforce obedience.
bulletpoints: Understanding love-bombing, fear-mongering, and isolation tactics.
Identifying thought-stopping techniques in cultic environments.

cards.title: Escaping Groupthink and Thought Reform
cards.description: Methods for detaching from collective programming and regaining independent critical thinking.
bulletpoints: Challenging enforced narratives and ideological purity tests.
Using logical fallacy detection to dismantle faulty reasoning.
Developing an evidence-based approach to decision-making.

cards.title: Building Psychological Resilience
cards.description: Techniques to fortify the mind against future attempts at psychological coercion and influence.
bulletpoints: Developing emotional detachment from manipulative influences.
Practicing reality-testing to strengthen mental defenses.
Utilizing social support systems and mentorship for reinforcement.
